/** * This is the interface to be used by all custom selectors, those that are * called through the <custom> tag. It is the amalgamation of two * interfaces, the FileSelector and the Parameterizable interface. Note that * you will almost certainly want the default behaviour for handling * Parameters, so you probably want to use the BaseExtendSelector class * as the base class for your custom selector rather than implementing * this interface from scratch. * * @since 1.5 */
